scripts.text: She's looking out a window.
She's taking an item out of a refrigerator.
She's grabbing a handful of carrots.
scripts.translation: 여자가 당근을 한 웅큼 움켜쥐고 있다.

scripts.text: She's putting some items in a bag.
One of the women is tying her shoe.
scripts.translation: 여자들 중 한 명이 신발끈을 묶고 있다.

scripts.text: One of the women is wearing a hat.
scripts.translation: 여자들 중 한 명이 모자를 쓰고 있다.

scripts.text: One of the women is standing near a park bench.
scripts.translation: 여자들 중 한 명이 공원 벤치 근처에 서 있다.

scripts.text: One of the women is carrying a computer up some stairs.
scripts.translation: 여자들 중 한 명이 컴퓨터를 들고 계단을 오르고 있다.

scripts.text: The man is setting a clock.
The man is reaching for a box.
The man is posting some information.
The man is handing some food to the woman.
He's twisting some wires.
He's pruning a bush next to a building.
scripts.translation: 남자가 건물 옆에 있는 관목 가지를 치고 있다.

scripts.text: He's lifting a block.
He's spreading cement with a shovel.
The women are facing a desk.
One of the women is holding a jacket.
scripts.translation: 여자들 중 한 명이 재킷을 들고 있다.

scripts.text: A drawer has been left open.
Some folders have been placed on top of a file cabinet.
Some cups have been emptied.
A fruit basket has been emptied.
Some coffee has spilled on the counter.
Some cups are being filled with water.
